name: P3
description: This is a very smooth and simple vape. Very direct and to the point. I use sweetener in mine but, you really dont need it. Feel free to add as much or as little sweetnes that you like. Hope you enjoy!
author: C6-R

reviews.text: Forget about OPP. I'm down with PPP.  I'm not a huge fruit vaper.  Custards and desserts are my go to but this mix is straight up delicious.  Smooth and for some reason I wanna watch Gilligan's Island reruns like i did on those lazy Saturdays of my youth.  Mix it or you'll miss out on a banger.
